name: Windzfare: Woocommerce based fundraising plugin
author: WindzWP

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)

Author

Developed by WindzWP

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Q. With Windzfare, do I still need a theme?

A. Yes, you still need theme.

Q. Is Windzfare free?

A. Yes it’s completely free.

sections.description: Easily create donation/fundraising pages using Windzfare, a powerful WordPress fundraising plugin. Windzfare provides you with an intuitive way to accept donations online through your own WordPress site in WooCommerce way.
